desc.zh-Hans: 北海道，日本四岛中的最北岛，因农业、渔业、煤炭开采和旅游业而繁荣。如今因资源枯竭面临人口流失，铁路运营也面临严重亏损。
desc.en: Hokkaido, the northenmost island in the major four islands of Japan, was once prosperous thanks to agriculture, fishing, coal exploitation and tourism. However, due to the depletion of resources, Hokkaido is faced with population loss, while the operation of railway encounters severe loss.
